# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

## [0.1.0] - 2025-10-19

### Added
- Initial release
- FastAPI-based Teams bot framework
- Support for text messages, Adaptive Cards, and file handling
- Pluggable message processor architecture
- CSV upload/download functionality
- Typing indicators
- Complete Bot Framework authentication
- Type hints and protocol definitions
- Comprehensive test suite
- Documentation and examples
- Simple echo bot example
- LangGraph integration example

[Unreleased]: https://github.com/vishalgoel2/fastapi-teams-bot/compare/v0.1.0...HEAD
[0.1.0]: https://github.com/vishalgoel2/fastapi-teams-bot/releases/tag/v0.1.0
